item.title: Leonardo DiCaprio Details How He Pursues Hollywood’s Top Directors: “I Let Them Know I’m Ready and Game If They Are”
item.description: The star is teaming up with Paul Thomas Anderson for the first time in ‘One Battle After Another,’ almost 30 years after turning down ‘Boogie Nights.’

item.title: Leonardo DiCaprio Details How He Pursues Hollywood’s Top Directors: “I Let Them Know I’m Ready and Game If They Are”
item.description: The star is teaming up with Paul Thomas Anderson for the first time in ‘One Battle After Another,’ almost 30 years after turning down ‘Boogie Nights.’

item.title: Toronto Festival Adds Bobby Farrelly, Brian Cox, Aziz Ansari and Guillermo del Toro Films
item.description: World bows have also been added for the latest movies starring Sydney Sweeney, Russell Crowe, Da’Vine Joy Randolph, Angelina Jolie, Seth Rogen, Keanu Reeves and Lily James.
